languages.text: {n}Голос из вокс-синтезатора странно меняется, обретает мягкость и расцветает низкими теплыми нотами.{/n} "Они — мои младшие братья и проводники на пути {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Их {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g} сопряжены напрямую с моим неокортексом, они улавливают импульсы из моего подсознания. Но порой они действуют, опережая мою мысль — так Омниссия направляет меня к познанию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос из вокс-синтезатора странно меняется, обретает мягкость и расцветает низкими теплыми нотами.{/n} "Они — мои младшие братья и проводники на пути {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Их {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g} сопряжены напрямую с моим неокортексом, благодаря чему они улавливают импульсы из моего подсознания. Но порой они действуют, опережая мою мысль — так сам Омниссия направляет меня к познанию".

languages.text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос из вокс-синтезатора странно меняется, обретает мягкость и расцветает низкими теплыми нотами.{/n} "Они — мои младшие братья и проводники на пути {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Их {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g} сопряжены напрямую с моим неокортексом, они улавливают импульсы из моего подсознания. Но порой они действуют, опережая мою мысль — так Омниссия направляет меня к познанию".

traits.locale_text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-caster changes, strangely becoming softer and blooming with low warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex, allowing them to pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex, allowing them to pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex, allowing them to pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

{n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

languages.text: {n}La voz procedente del voco sintetizador cambia, volviéndose más suave, adquiriendo matices más graves y cálidos.{/n} «Son mis hermanos menores y me orientan por la senda del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} están vinculados directamente a mi neocórtex y captan impulsos de mi subconsciente. A veces incluso se adelantan a mis pensamientos; así es como el Omnissiah me guía hasta la comprensión».
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz procedente del vocosintetizador cambia, volviéndose más suave, adquiriendo matices más graves y cálidos.{/n} «Son mis hermanos menores y me orientan por la senda del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} están vinculados directamente a mi neocórtex y captan impulsos de mi subconsciente. A veces incluso se adelantan a mis pensamientos; así es como el Omnissiah me guía hasta la comprensión».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス・シンセサイザーから放たれる声が変化し、妙に柔らかく、低く温かみのある感情が込められている。{/n}「彼らは私の弟であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}への道しるべでもある。彼らの{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}は私の新皮質に直接結合し、私の潜在意識から発せられる信号を拾う。私が考える前に行動に移すことがある。万機神はこのようにして私を理解へと導いてくれる」
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス・シンセサイザーから放たれる声が変化し、妙に柔らかく、低く温かみのある感情が込められている。{/n}「彼らは私の弟であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}への道しるべでもある。彼らの{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}は私の新皮質に直接結合し、私の潜在意識から発せられる信号を拾う。私が考える前に行動に移すことがある。万機神はこのようにして私を理解へと導いてくれる」

languages.text: {n}音阵装置传出来的声音发生了变化，变得异常柔和，充满了低沉、温暖的底音。{/n}“他们是我的弟弟，会指引我觐见{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}。他们的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}直接连接到我的大脑皮层，会从我的潜意识中捕获本能冲动。有时候，他们会比我的思想更快做出反应——这就是欧姆尼塞亚引导我的方式。”
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置传出来的声音发生了变化，变得异常柔和，充满了低沉、温暖的底音。{/n}“他们是我的弟弟，会指引我觐见{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}。他们的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}直接连接到我的大脑皮层，会从我的潜意识中捕获本能冲动。有时候，他们会比我的思想更快做出反应——这就是欧姆尼塞亚引导我的方式。”

languages.text: {n}La voix qui sort du synthétiseur-vox se fait étrangement plus douce, chargée de tonalités basses et chaudes.{/n} « Ce sont mes jeunes sœurs qui me guident sur la voie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} sont directement liés à mon néocortex et captent les impulsions de mon subconscient. Elles devancent parfois mes pensées ; c'est ainsi que l'Omnimessie me conduit à la compréhension. »
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix qui sort du synthétiseur-vox se fait étrangement plus douce, chargée de tonalités basses et chaudes.{/n} « Ce sont mes jeunes sœurs qui me guident sur la voie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} sont directement liés à mon néocortex et captent les impulsions de mon subconscient. Elles devancent parfois mes pensées ; c'est ainsi que l'Omnimessie me conduit à la compréhension. »

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme aus dem Vox-Synthesizer ändert sich, wird auf merkwürdige Art weicher, es erblühen tiefe, warme Untertöne.{/n} "Sie sind meine jüngeren Brüder und Führer auf dem Weg zum {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Ihre {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} sind direkt mit meinem Neocortex verbunden und empfangen Impulse aus meinem Unterbewusstsein. Manchmal agieren sie schon vor meinen Gedanken — so führt der Omnissiah mich zum Verständnis."
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme aus dem Vox-Synthesizer ändert sich, wird auf merkwürdige Art weicher, es erblühen tiefe, warme Untertöne.{/n} "Sie sind meine jüngeren Brüder und Führer auf dem Weg zum {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Ihre {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} sind direkt mit meinem Neocortex verbunden und empfangen Impulse aus meinem Unterbewusstsein. Manchmal agieren sie schon vor meinen Gedanken — so führt der Omnissiah mich zum Verständnis."

languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the Omnissiah. Their machine spirits are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

languages.text: {n}Voks sentezleyiciden gelen ses değişiyor ve tuhaf derecede daha yumuşak, alttan alttan hafif ve sıcak tınılara sahip bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Onlar benim küçük kardeşlerimdir. Bana {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'e{/g} giden yolu gösterirler. {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Makine ruhları{/g} direkt olarak neokorteksime bağlıdır ve bilinçaltımdaki dürtüleri algılayabilirler. Bazen daha düşüncelerim şekillenmeden harekete geçerler, Hermesih beni idraka bu şekilde yönlendirir."
languages.original_text: {n}The voice coming from the vox-synth changes, becoming strangely softer, blooming with low, warm undertones.{/n} "They are my younger brothers and guides on the way to the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Their {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} are directly bound to my neocortex and pick up impulses from my subconscious. Sometimes they act ahead of my thoughts — this is how the Omnissiah leads me to comprehension."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks sentezleyicisinden gelen ses değişiyor ve tuhaf derecede daha yumuşak, alttan alttan hafif ve sıcak tınılara sahip bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Onlar benim küçük kardeşlerimdir ve bana {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'e giden yolu gösterirler. {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Makine ruhları{/g} direkt olarak neokorteksime bağlıdır ve bilinçaltımdaki dürtüleri algılayabilirler. Bazen daha düşüncelerim şekillenmeden harekete geçerler, Hermesih beni idraka bu şekilde yönlendirir."
